text: haey chaur komaoy anak del mean ke tde y sa thlaithnaur ning meanotropy sa mb tde sdokasdamph knongchamnaom puok anak( anak mean chomnue) sbath tha chhb brichcheaktean dl bangobaaun sachnheate( robsa ke) ning banda anak kreikr haeyning banda anak phiesakhluon knong meakra a l laoh aoy saoh . haey chaur aoy puokke aphytosa ning cheh athyeasry aoy knea . tae puok anak min chaul chetd chngaoy a l laoh aphytosa dl puok anak te ryy? haey a l laoh mha aphytosa mha anet sraleanh
